articles.author: Daniel Politi
articles.title: Peru protests prompt closure of Machu Picchu - CP24
articles.description: Peru indefinitely shut the famed ancient ruins of Machu Picchu on Saturday in the latest sign that anti-government protests that began last month are increasingly engulfing the South American country.
articles.content: LIMA, Peru (AP) - Peru indefinitely shut the famed ancient ruins of Machu Picchu on Saturday in the latest sign that anti-government protests that began last month are increasingly engulfing the Sout… [+3559 chars]

articles.description: Rose Lavelle found the net twice in a stellar performance against Football Ferns.
